title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.03 - Design of Warning Signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.03 - Design of Warning Signs

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 04. INSERT the following paragraphs: Option: 03A Minor legend changes may be made to standard warning
signs in order to meet actual needs. Standard: 03B Any change to a warning sign that can be considered
more than a minor modification (see Section
1A.03
), or a unique warning sign, shall be approved by the New York State Department of Transportation before it
is used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.03

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
